title: New: Big Cosmos – Pathfinder
content:
This debut track from the UK’s very own Big Cosmos sort of sounds like White Lies on acid, or Friendly Fires on chlorpromazine.

It’s electronic dreampop are it’s utmost epic, complete with vaguely mysterious vocals and lyrics -‘your diamonds eyes are alight tonight’ and ‘through the millions of years, there’s a history of tears, that collect in our bones, cells and our souls.’ being aptly fitting examples. So the production isn’t quite as slick as some of their contemporaries, but it’s certainly promising. Check out Pathfinder below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
